name: Curacel
headline: AI Powered Insurance Infrastructure
description: AI-powered API to sell & process insurance across emerging markets globally. At Curacel, we leverage artificial intelligence to make it faster and more efficient to access and manage insurance. Our solutions help insurers reduce fraud, streamline claims, and improve customer experience. We are building the infrastructure to make insurance work seamlessly for the next billion users across Africa and other emerging markets.

founders.name: Henry Mascot, Founder
founders.description: Henry, co-founder/CEO of Curacel, has transformed insurance in emerging markets powering big insurers in 10 markets like AXA. Raised $3.5 million from top VCs including YCombinator, Tencent, and Google. He leads product and sales at Curacel. Henry holds an Engineering degree. Previously, he spearheaded growth at 54Gene (YCW19) in the early days, securing major partnerships. At AmplifyPay, he led sales strategies, acquiring significant banking clients, laying the groundwork for Curacel.

## AI-powered Infrastructure for Insurance
Transform your insurance operations with AI. Modular API platform for leading insurers & businesses in 10 countries.
[Get Started](https://curacel.co/</contact-us>)
![digital insurance API in Nigeria, Africa](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/63750bd49cbcb66ef4a90343_Grow_header_image.svg)
Trusted by the fastest growing brands
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/6380ddd91484f12d4b13bd99_axa.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/65673548c3e399e7cd6b5a5d_ALAT_By_Wema_Bank.jpg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/63762dc507e8bd493d088d20_image%2015.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/6380dd5cbd14027543b16f0f_old%20mutual.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/6380dd1f5af6afb96971de70_pocket.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/656090252c00736b478cb9b6_lipa-later-logos-idNO2ZhzuK.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/65608f991ff7151139dff7fc_logo2.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/6380ddd91484f12d4b13bd99_axa.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/65673548c3e399e7cd6b5a5d_ALAT_By_Wema_Bank.jpg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/63762dc507e8bd493d088d20_image%2015.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/6380dd5cbd14027543b16f0f_old%20mutual.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/64e6048964491f962407d5bb_piggyvest_pocket.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/656090252c00736b478cb9b6_lipa-later-logos-idNO2ZhzuK.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/65608f991ff7151139dff7fc_logo2.png)
THE CURACEL PLATFORM
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/63767dc6ad81f66c26ebf60f_Image%20\(1\).png)
Curacel Grow
Acquire new users, boost sales, and enhance revenue through embedded insurance products.‍
[Learn more](https://curacel.co/</grow>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/63a2c76dc31fc6878f6d82da_mobile_h_claims_.png)
Curacel Health
Process 10x more health claims with minimal effort and reduce fraud, saving up to 20% in lost revenue
[Learn more](https://curacel.co/</product-health-claims>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/6375f09328bf0d0605e1439a_auto%20insurance%20\(1\).png)
Curacel Auto
Speed up auto insurance assessments, claims and payouts through an AI-powered process.‍
[Learn more](https://curacel.co/</product-auto>)
Benefits of our AI-Powered Solutions
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/63750bd358914f513ecb1673_presention-chart.svg)
Streamlined Claims Processing
Curacel's advanced AI-driven tools enable rapid processing of health insurance claims with minimal human intervention, significantly increasing operational efficiency.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/6375c0feb64a723bf0c334f1_verify.svg)
Robust Fraud Detection
The platform's sophisticated fraud detection capabilities effectively identify and curb fraudulent claims, protecting revenue and enhancing financial security.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/63750bd2c3d120815bf51c04_graph.svg)
Enhanced Revenue
Curacel Grow assists Fintech, Credit, Logistics, and eCommerce companies in Africa in expanding their customer base and increasing sales through integrated insurance products, opening new avenues for growth and profitability.
What are Our customers saying?
"With Curacel, we have increased the number of claims processed per day by 4X and a better relationship with our providers"
Biodun Adeyemi
HCI HMO
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/63f33e95e5b3e085cfb0f0c7_Play.svg)
"Curacel enabled us to give our customers peace of mind and increase customer confidence."
Mosope Owasanoye
Topship
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/63f33e95e5b3e085cfb0f0c7_Play.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/636d62107a1a9b3a3e266c7f_Vector%402x.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/636d6186dc781a3cff78f82c_Vector%402x.png)
INSURANCE MANAGEMENT TOOLS FOR LEADING INDUSTRIES
**Automate your entire insurance process**
We provide insurance solutions in Africa and emerging markets with fully integrated platformsthat bring together everything required to automate the insurance process for leading industries
[Get Started](https://curacel.co/</contact-us>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/63750bd55f1083bb80bf32ed_Image.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/63750bd5c3d1201170f51c1b_iPhone%2013%20\(1\).svg)

What are Customers Saying
Here's how our partners are benefiting, in their own words
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/63750bbfafdabf597f741f39_Moses%20Enenwali.svg)

Moses Enenwali

Adebayo Adewumi
OnePort 365

We knew that we wanted to provide insurance to support the small businesses using Oze and as soon as we saw a demo we knew that Curacel could help us to do it. From day 1 the process has been seamless.
Megan McCormick
OZE

Have an enquiry, request or would like to work with us? Let us know what your needs are and a member of our team will get in touch!

Benefits of our AI-Powered Solutions
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/63750bd358914f513ecb1673_presention-chart.svg)
Streamlined Claims Processing
Curacel's advanced AI-driven tools enable rapid processing of health insurance claims with minimal human intervention, significantly increasing operational efficiency.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/6375c0feb64a723bf0c334f1_verify.svg)
Robust Fraud Detection
The platform's sophisticated fraud detection capabilities effectively identify and curb fraudulent claims, protecting revenue and enhancing financial security.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636cd89449397edf946d99a9/63750bd2c3d120815bf51c04_graph.svg)
Enhanced Revenue
Curacel Grow assists Fintech, Credit, Logistics, and eCommerce companies in Africa in expanding their customer base and increasing sales through integrated insurance products, opening new avenues for growth and profitability.

generated_description:
Curacel is an innovative company based in Lagos, Nigeria, that aims to revolutionize the insurance industry through AI-powered infrastructure. Founded in 2019 and a proud member of the Y Combinator Batch W22, Curacel has positioned itself at the intersection of technology and financial services, particularly in emerging markets.

### Mission and Operations
The core mission of Curacel is to provide a seamless, AI-driven insurance experience. They started with an AI-powered API designed to sell and process insurance services across global emerging markets. By leveraging artificial intelligence, Curacel's solutions help insurers reduce fraud, streamline claims processing, and enhance customer experiences.

Curacel focuses on building an infrastructure that aims to make insurance accessible and efficient for the next billion users in Africa and beyond. Their offerings include products like Curacel Grow, which enables businesses to manage and distribute insurance faster; Curacel Health, which processes health claims and detects fraud; Curacel Pay for automating payment operations; and Curacel Auto for streamlining auto insurance processes.

### Team and Structure
Curacel operates with a team of about 30 dedicated employees, led and supported by Brad Flora as their Group Partner. This relatively lean team structure allows for nimble operations and a focused approach to scaling their technology and services.

### Industry Impact
The company is categorized under several tags including fintech, SaaS, B2B, API, and insurance, highlighting its multifaceted approach to transforming financial services. Their clients include various sectors, from logistics to fintech and healthcare, demonstrating their versatile solutions tailored to the needs of diverse industries.

### Recruitment and Community
Curacel is also committed to nurturing new talent through its Graduate Trainee and Undergraduate Internship programs, further solidifying its roots in the local ecosystem while boosting innovation in the insurance sector.

Through its suite of products and focus on increasing operational efficiency, Curacel is not just participating in the insurance revolution–it’s steering it. They are a part of a broader narrative where technology meets essential services in Africa, paving the way for a more inclusive financial future.

For more information about their offerings and how to get involved, you can visit their website: [curacel.co](https://curacel.co).
